attributes.action: to change the new law of the first july 2005 to make it retrospective towards all victims and families of murder victims to equlity before the law everyone right to protection by law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i was a victim of a failed mental health patient who gained rights over me . he was found gulity of the attempted murder of me and section into broadmoor hospital and 11years later he was being reintergration in the very same area where i live and my family do and also it was the same hospital that had failed him 3 times before i wasnt given any warning due to patient confindental where the victims charter or rights of protect by law to a legitemate legal warning of escape due to carelessness hope that the promise is kept change the law equilty before the law victims rights to warnings and families a right to warning of escapes and reintergration of failed mental health patient
